mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit(recruitno, cateno, title, seqno, content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, sdate, edate, file1, thumb1, size1) VALUES(recruit_seq.nextval,#{cateno}, #{title}, #{seqno}, #{content}, #{homepage}, #{passwd}, #{word}, sysdate, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{file1}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno, content, homepage ,passwd, word, rdate, sdate, edate FROM recruit ORDER BY recruitno DESC
SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno ,content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, sdate, edate file1, thumb1, size1 FROM recruit WHERE cateno = #{cateno} ORDER BY recruitno DESC
SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno ,content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, sdate, edate file1, thumb1, size1 FROM recruit WHERE recruitno = #{recruitno}
